short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button that allows you to turn off and on the annotations on Youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you just want to watch a music video without those annoying annotations popping up and ruining your enjoyment.  This extension add button to the toolbar of YouTube videos that allows you to toggle annotations on and off.  Please report any missed annotation or problems.  Future update will include the ability to have annotations hidden by default.
